item.description:
Boston Marketing Learning Group Meeting -
WAYS TO REDUCE YOUR PRINTING & POSTAGE COSTS

Paul Carroll, President and CEO of American Printing will be presenting during this FREE meeting and he will share techniques that can save money on your printing and mailing costs. With 30 years experience Paul has seen the industry go through many revolutionary changes from metal type to the current electronic revolution. As a major force in the industry - Paul's company provides printing for CVS, Foster Grant, Samsung, Tom Tom, John Hancock and many other Fortune 100 companies.

THE FOLLOWING PRINTING AND MAILING TOPICS WILL BE COVERED:
  • What design tips can help keep the printing costs down?
  • Does size really matter?
  • What is the cross over point between digital printing vs running
    conventional offset printing?
  • Can the call to action be set up for multiple usage?
  • Point of purchase applications that are not expensive to produce.
  • New postal regulations provide for strong penalties if your piece is not correctly handled?



Print and mail are still a proven method to drive potential customers to your web site and begin to build a brand presence. Printing is part of the overall marketing program that needs to be included in branding and name recognition. As interruption marketing - all of us love to open mail at home. Printing fills that needs and provides a lasting impression.

RSVP for this FREE MEETING!
